name: twitchcommander
description: An application commanding an emulator by receiveing key from twitch

scripts.preinstall-cUrl: curl -LO %npm_package_config_bcbEmulator% && curl -L -o flow.json %npm_package_config_nodeRedBackup% && curl -L -o commandsSent.sql %npm_package_config_sqlBackup% && curl -L -o rom.gb %npm_package_config_romGB%
scripts.preinstall-CP: move bgb.zip .\SRC\Emulator\bgb.zip && move flow.json .\SRC\backups\flow.json && move rom.gb .\SRC\Emulator\rom.gb && move commandsSent.sql .\SRC\backups\commandsSent.sql
scripts.preinstall-unzip: CD SRC\Emulator\ && tar -xf bgb.zip && del /f bgb.zip &&CD ..\..
scripts.preinstall-docker: MKDIR SRC\DockerSubSystems\mysql && MKDIR SRC\DockerSubSystems\node-red-data && docker compose up -d
scripts.preinstall-javascriptclone: git clone %npm_package_config_gitRepo% .\SRC\JAVASCRIPT\ && CD .\SRC\JAVASCRIPT\ && git checkout develop && npm install && cd ..\..
scripts.preinstall: npm run preinstall-create && npm run preinstall-cUrl && npm run preinstall-CP && npm run preinstall-unzip && npm run preinstall-docker && npm run preinstall-javascriptclone

author: a.lewandowski
